doc:
André Cheron (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andr%C3%A9_Cheron_(actor) 0 André Cheron (August 24, 1880 – January 26, 1952) was a French-born American character actor of the late silent and early sound film eras. During his 16-year career he appeared in over 100 films, usually in smaller roles, although with the occasional featured part. André_Cheron ( August_24 , 1880 – January_26_,_1952 ) was a_French-born_American_character_actor of the_late_silent_and_early_sound_film_eras . During his_16-year_career he appeared in over_100_films , usually in smaller_roles , although with the_occasional_featured_part .
